TestInformation.Title: POV-Ray
TestInformation.Description: This is a test of POV-Ray, the Persistence of Vision Raytracer. POV-Ray is used to create 3D graphics using ray-tracing.
TestInformation.SubTitle: Total Time

TestProfile.ExternalDependencies: build-utilities, boost-development, jpeg-development, tiff, libpng-development, zlib-development
